GLOBAL TREND
GLOBAL TREND
Full Stack Development Internship â€“ Skill Assessment Assignment
Objective
This assignment is designed to assess your understanding of front-end development, back-end
logic, databases, and basic system design, along with code quality and problem-solving skills.
Assignment Overview
Build a simple Task Management Web Application where users can create, view, update, and
delete tasks.
Functional Requirements
Frontend

delete tasks.
Functional Requirements
Frontend
- Responsive UI using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript (Frameworks optional)
- Task list page and add task form
- Task fields: Title, Description, Status
Backend
- REST API using Node.js (Express) or Python (Django/Flask)
- CRUD operations for tasks
Database
- MySQL / PostgreSQL / MongoDB
- Persistent data storage
Bonus (Optional)
- Authentication, deployment, filters, documentation, testing
Submission Instructions
- GitHub repository link

Submission Instructions
- GitHub repository link
- README with setup instructions
- Optional deployed link
Evaluation Criteria
- Code quality, fundamentals, organisation, problem-solving
